title: Matalan Black Friday 2019 deal predictions as retailer promises 'biggest sale ever'
text:

High street chain Matalan will be joining the masses of retailers offering shoppers huge price cuts for Black Friday this year.

The retailer is set to roll out discounts across all departments, including kids and home in what it tips to be its 'biggest sale ever'.

Not only will shoppers be able to pick up bargains at any of the 200 Matalan stores across the UK, many of the discounts will also be available to buy online at matalan.co.uk .

However, online shoppers wanting to pick up Matalan discounts right now can score £15 off to spend on Christmas decorations.

The deal is thanks to money-saving cashback site TopCashback.co.uk who are giving all new members £15 bonus to cover the cost of some or all their shop.

All customers need to do is sign up online for free, find the Matalan £15 bonus deal and click through to the retailer's site to shop as normal before midnight on 17 November.

Following your purchase make sure you spend £15 or more to get the full bonus back, TopCashback will then track your order and pay out the £15 into your member's account. But it is worth noting that the whole process can take up to 30 days to process before you can cash it out to your bank or Paypal account.

What departments will be on sale?

(Image: Western Mail)

Last year saw savings of between 30 and 70 per cent off, so it's likely that the chain will offer similar discounts this time around.

Whilst Matalan hasn't shared exact deal information, it will be showcasing all the latest and biggest deals on its official Black Friday 2019 page online . So keep the page bookmarked to get first dibs on savings as they go live.

Shoppers can also sign up to the brand's newsletter to get all the latest information straight into their inbox - ideal if you plan to shop from your phone on the way to work on the actual day of the sale.

Online Matalan shoppers can take advantage of free delivery on order over £50 and free click and collect services.

For shoppers eager to pick up their items straight away also have the option of next day click and collect for £1.99 or next day delivery for 4.95 too.

If you want to keep up to date with the latest developments in the run up to Black Friday 2019 read our guide . Here you'll find latest news, shopping tips and more insights ahead of November 29.

Also keep an eye out for our round up of the biggest deals on the day.
description: The countdown to Black Friday 2019 is on and this is everything you need to know if you plan on shopping the best deals from value chain Matalan on the day
